content: How do I prevent a flu?

To avoid the flu, try washing your hands regularly, getting a flu shot, and avoiding sick people. And if all else fails, you can always just live in a bubble. It's a great conversation starter too. Stay healthy!

Oh, we're talking about the seafood kind, right? Well, you can get crabs by buying them at a seafood market or catching them yourself. Just be careful not to anger any shellfish while you're at it. Bon appétit!
I meant the genital warts crab.

Ah, got it. Well, those particular crabs are usually transmitted through sexual contact. To prevent them, practice safe sex, communicate openly with your partner, and consider regular check-ups with a healthcare professional. Sorry to disappoint if you were hoping for a seafood recipe instead!
